import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export export default function () { const navigate=useNavigate(); const[username, setUsername]=useState('') const[email, setEmail]=useState('') const[password, setPassword]=useState('') const[firstName,setFirst_Name]=useState(''); const[lastName,setLast_Name]=useState(''); const[creditCardDetails,setCredit_Card_Details]=useState('') const[contact,setContact]=useState(''); const[drivingLicenseNumber,setDriving_License_Number]=useState(''); const[address,setAddress]=useState(''); const postData=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); alert("Data registered successfully!!") Axios.post('http://localhost:8080/customer/register',{ username, email, password, firstName, lastName, contact, creditCardDetails, drivingLicenseNumber, address }).then((res) =>{ console.log("data posted",res) navigate("/login") }).catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

Register

setUsername(e.target.value)}/> setEmail(e.target.value)}/> setPassword(e.target.value)}/> setFirst_Name(e.target.value)}/> setLast_Name(e.target.value)}/> setContact(e.target.value)}/> setCredit_Card_Details(e.target.value)}/> setDriving_License_Number(e.target.value)}/>
) }
